ABOUT US

Launched by the Global Alliance of SMEs (GASME), World Manufacturing Convention 2018 is co-hosted by Global Alliance of SMEs, United Nations Industrial Development Organization, Anhui Provincial Government, Chinese People’s Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries. This convention will kick off in Hefei in May 2018.

RECENT NEWS

  • Anhui Provincial Party Secretary Li Jinbin met with Former German President Christian Wulff 2017年6月19日
  • Ningbo Thunderstruck Holdings Co., Ltd as the Organizer of World Manufacturing Convention 2018 2017年6月15日
  • Vice Premier Ma Kai Met with Former German President Christian Wulff 2017年6月13日
